data.system_settings: iPhone 6s, iOS 11.2.5 & iPad Air 2, iOS 11.3 PB 2
data.short_description: Discord crashes when quickly closing out of channels in server settings
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to any server where you have manage channels permission - Open the server settings - Open the section `Channels` - Hit the close/back button as fast as you can - Try it multiple times with different servers when you can't reproduce it with the first try
